verses.verse: וְהָרָעָ֖ב <S%H7458><s%> ve-ha-ra-'Av And the famine כָּבֵ֥ד <S%H3515><s%> ka-Ved [was] sore בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz. in the land

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi, came כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher which כִּלּוּ֙ <S%H3615><s%> kil-Lu had finished לֶאֱכֹ֣ל <S%H398><s%> le-'e-Chol eating אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַשֶּׁ֔בֶר <S%H7668><s%> hash-She-ver, the corn אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which הֵבִ֖יאוּ <S%H935><s%> he-Vi-'u which they had brought out מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem about אֲבִיהֶ֔ם <S%H1><s%> 'a-vi-Hem, their father שֻׁ֖בוּ <S%H7725><s%> Shu-vu unto them Go again שִׁבְרוּ־ <S%H7666><s%> shiv-ru- buy לָ֥נוּ La-nu מְעַט־ <S%H4592><s%> me-'at- us a little אֹֽכֶל׃ <S%H400><s%> 'O-chel. food

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer spake אֵלָ֛יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav about יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah And Judah לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; unto him saying הָעֵ֣ד <S%H5749><s%> ha-'Ed did solemnly הֵעִד֩ <S%H5749><s%> he-'Id protest בָּ֨נוּ Ba-nu הָאִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish The man לֵאמֹר֙ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor unto us saying לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not תִרְא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> tir-'U Ye shall not see פָנַ֔י <S%H6440><s%> fa-Nai, my face בִּלְתִּ֖י <S%H1115><s%> bil-Ti except אֲחִיכֶ֥ם <S%H251><s%> 'a-chi-Chem your brother אִתְּכֶֽם׃ <S%H854><s%> 'it-te-Chem. for

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If יֶשְׁךָ֛ <S%H3426><s%> yesh-Cha If thou wilt מְשַׁלֵּ֥חַ <S%H7971><s%> me-shal-Le-ach send אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אָחִ֖ינוּ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi-nu our brother אִתָּ֑נוּ <S%H854><s%> 'it-Ta-nu; for נֵרְדָ֕ה <S%H3381><s%> ne-re-Dah with us we will go down וְנִשְׁבְּרָ֥ה <S%H7666><s%> ve-nish-be-Rah and buy לְךָ֖ le-Cha אֹֽכֶל׃ <S%H400><s%> 'O-chel. thee food

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- if אֵינְךָ֥ <S%H369><s%> 'ei-ne-Cha not מְשַׁלֵּ֖חַ <S%H7971><s%> me-shal-Le-ach But if thou wilt not send לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo we will not נֵרֵ֑ד <S%H3381><s%> ne-Red; [him] we will not go down כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for הָאִ֞ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish for the man אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar said אֵלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-nu about לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- You will not תִרְא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> tir-'U unto us Ye shall not see פָנַ֔י <S%H6440><s%> fa-Nai, my face בִּלְתִּ֖י <S%H1115><s%> bil-Ti unless אֲחִיכֶ֥ם <S%H251><s%> 'a-chi-Chem except your brother אִתְּכֶֽם׃ <S%H854><s%> 'it-te-Chem. for

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, And Israel לָמָ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> la-Mah Why הֲרֵעֹתֶ֖ם <S%H7489><s%> ha-re-'o-Tem Wherefore dealt ye [so] ill לִ֑י Li; לְהַגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> le-hag-Gid with me [as] to tell לָאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> la-'Ish, the man הַע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> ha-'od still לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem אָֽח׃ <S%H251><s%> 'Ach. they

וַיֹּאמְר֡וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru And they said שָׁא֣וֹל <S%H7592><s%> sha-'ol asked שָֽׁאַל־ <S%H7592><s%> sha-'al- us straitly הָ֠אִישׁ <S%H376><s%> Ha-'ish The man לָ֣נוּ La-nu וּלְמֽוֹלַדְתֵּ֜נוּ <S%H4138><s%> u-le-mo-lad-Te-nu of our state and of our kindred לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying הַע֨וֹד <S%H5750><s%> ha-'od still אֲבִיכֶ֥ם <S%H1><s%> 'a-vi-Chem [Is] your father חַי֙ <S%H2416><s%> chai age הֲיֵ֣שׁ <S%H3426><s%> ha-Yesh there are לָכֶ֣ם la-Chem אָ֔ח <S%H251><s%> 'Ach, your brother וַנַ֨גֶּד־ <S%H5046><s%> va-Nag-ged- bewray ל֔וֹ lo, עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- him according פִּ֖י <S%H6310><s%> pi to the tenor הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> had-de-va-Rim of these words הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh; we הֲיָד֣וֹעַ <S%H3045><s%> ha-ya-Do-a' could we certainly נֵדַ֔ע <S%H3045><s%> ne-Da', know כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki would יֹאמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> yo-Mar, that he would say הוֹרִ֖ידוּ <S%H3381><s%> ho-Ri-du down אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲחִיכֶֽם׃ <S%H251><s%> 'a-chi-Chem. your brother

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוּדָ֜ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah And Judah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- unto יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El unto Israel אָבִ֗יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv, his father שִׁלְחָ֥ה <S%H7971><s%> shil-Chah Send הַנַּ֛עַר <S%H5288><s%> han-Na-'ar the lad אִתִּ֖י <S%H854><s%> 'it-Ti and we וְנָק֣וּמָה <S%H6965><s%> ve-na-Ku-mah with me and we will arise וְנֵלֵ֑כָה <S%H1980><s%> ve-ne-Le-chah; and go וְנִֽחְיֶה֙ <S%H2421><s%> ve-nich-Yeh that we may live וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo and not נָמ֔וּת <S%H4191><s%> na-Mut, and not die גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- well אֲנַ֥חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> 'a-Nach-nu we גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- well אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- well טַפֵּֽנוּ׃ <S%H2945><s%> tap-Pe-nu. both we and thou [and] also our little ones

אָֽנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi myself אֶֽעֶרְבֶ֔נּוּ <S%H6148><s%> 'e-'er-Ven-nu, I will be surety מִיָּדִ֖י <S%H3027><s%> mi-ya-Di for him of my hand תְּבַקְשֶׁ֑נּוּ <S%H1245><s%> te-vak-Shen-nu; shalt thou require אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- him not לֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> lo not הֲבִיאֹתִ֤יו <S%H935><s%> ha-vi-'o-Tiv I bring אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha to you וְהִצַּגְתִּ֣יו <S%H3322><s%> ve-hitz-tzag-Tiv unto thee and set לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nei-cha, him before thee וְחָטָ֥אתִֽי <S%H2398><s%> ve-cha-Ta-ti then let me bear the blame לְךָ֖ le-Cha כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- for הַיָּמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> hai-ya-Mim. for ever

כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki surely לוּלֵ֣א <S%H3884><s%> lu-Le For except הִתְמַהְמָ֑הְנוּ <S%H4102><s%> hit-mah-Ma-he-nu; we had lingered כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- surely עַתָּ֥ה <S%H6258><s%> 'at-Tah now שַׁ֖בְנוּ <S%H7725><s%> Shav-nu surely now we had returned זֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh he פַעֲמָֽיִם׃ <S%H6471><s%> fa-'a-Ma-yim. this second time

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֲלֵהֶ֜ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem about יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El Israel אֲבִיהֶ֗ם <S%H1><s%> 'a-vi-Hem, And their father אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If כֵּ֣ן׀ <S%H3651><s%> ken so אֵפוֹא֮ <S%H645><s%> 'e-fO unto them If [it must be] so now זֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> zot likewise עֲשׂוּ֒ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Su do קְח֞וּ <S%H3947><s%> ke-Chu this take מִזִּמְרַ֤ת <S%H2173><s%> miz-zim-Rat of the best fruits הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz in the land בִּכְלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H3627><s%> bich-lei-Chem, in your vessels וְהוֹרִ֥ידוּ <S%H3381><s%> ve-ho-Ri-du and carry down לָאִ֖ישׁ <S%H582><s%> la-'Ish as מִנְחָ֑ה <S%H4503><s%> min-Chah; a present מְעַ֤ט <S%H4592><s%> me-'At a little צֳרִי֙ <S%H6875><s%> tzo-Ri balm וּמְעַ֣ט <S%H4592><s%> u-me-'At and a little דְּבַ֔שׁ <S%H1706><s%> de-Vash, honey נְכֹ֣את <S%H5219><s%> ne-Chot spices וָלֹ֔ט <S%H3910><s%> va-Lot, and myrrh בָּטְנִ֖ים <S%H992><s%> ba-te-Nim nuts וּשְׁקֵדִֽים׃ <S%H8247><s%> u-she-ke-Dim. and almonds

וְכֶ֥סֶף <S%H3701><s%> ve-Che-sef money מִשְׁנֶ֖ה <S%H4932><s%> mish-Neh double קְח֣וּ <S%H3947><s%> ke-Chu And take בְיֶדְכֶ֑ם <S%H3027><s%> ve-yed-Chem; in your hand וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַכֶּ֜סֶף <S%H3701><s%> hak-Ke-sef and the money הַמּוּשָׁ֨ב <S%H7725><s%> ham-mu-Shav that was brought again בְּפִ֤י <S%H6310><s%> be-Fi in the mouth אַמְתְּחֹֽתֵיכֶם֙ <S%H572><s%> 'am-te-cho-tei-Chem of your sacks תָּשִׁ֣יבוּ <S%H7725><s%> ta-Shi-vu carry [it] again בְיֶדְכֶ֔ם <S%H3027><s%> ve-yed-Chem, in your hand אוּלַ֥י <S%H194><s%> 'u-Lai perhaps מִשְׁגֶּ֖ה <S%H4870><s%> mish-Geh peradventure it [was] an oversight הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hu. he

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אֲחִיכֶ֖ם <S%H251><s%> 'a-chi-Chem also your brother קָ֑חוּ <S%H3947><s%> Ka-chu; Take וְק֖וּמוּ <S%H6965><s%> ve-Ku-mu and arise שׁ֥וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> Shu-vu go again אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָאִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish. unto the man

וְאֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> ve-'El And God שַׁדַּ֗י <S%H7706><s%> shad-Dai, Almighty יִתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> yit-Ten give לָכֶ֤ם la-Chem רַחֲמִים֙ <S%H7356><s%> ra-cha-Mim you mercy לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before הָאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish, the man וְשִׁלַּ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> ve-shil-Lach that he may send away לָכֶ֛ם la-Chem אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲחִיכֶ֥ם <S%H251><s%> 'a-chi-Chem brother אַחֵ֖ר <S%H312><s%> 'a-Cher your other וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בִּנְיָמִ֑ין <S%H1144><s%> bin-ya-Min; and Benjamin וַאֲנִ֕י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni I כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher If שָׁכֹ֖לְתִּי <S%H7921><s%> sha-Cho-le-ti I be bereaved שָׁכָֽלְתִּי׃ <S%H7921><s%> sha-Chal-ti. [of my children] I am bereaved

וַיִּקְח֤וּ <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Chu took הָֽאֲנָשִׁים֙ <S%H376><s%> ha-'a-na-Shim the men אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמִּנְחָ֣ה <S%H4503><s%> ham-min-Chah present הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot, that וּמִשְׁנֶה־ <S%H4932><s%> u-mish-neh- double כֶּ֛סֶף <S%H3701><s%> Ke-sef money לָקְח֥וּ <S%H3947><s%> la-ke-Chu and they took בְיָדָ֖ם <S%H3027><s%> ve-ya-Dam in their hand וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בִּנְיָמִ֑ן <S%H1144><s%> bin-ya-Min; and Benjamin וַיָּקֻ֙מוּ֙ <S%H6965><s%> vai-ya-Ku-mu and rose up וַיֵּרְד֣וּ <S%H3381><s%> vai-ye-re-Du and went down מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, to Egypt וַיַּֽעַמְד֖וּ <S%H5975><s%> vai-ya-'am-Du and stood לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יוֹסֵֽף׃ <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef. Joseph

וַיַּ֨רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar saw יוֹסֵ֣ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef And when Joseph אִתָּם֮ <S%H854><s%> 'it-Tam with אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בִּנְיָמִין֒ <S%H1144><s%> bin-ya-Min Benjamin וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer them he said לַֽאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> la-'a-Sher after עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- unto בֵּית֔וֹ <S%H1004><s%> bei-To, to the ruler of his house הָבֵ֥א <S%H935><s%> ha-Ve Bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H582><s%> ha-'a-na-Shim [these] men הַבָּ֑יְתָה <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-ye-tah; home וּטְבֹ֤חַ <S%H2873><s%> u-te-Vo-ach and slay טֶ֙בַח֙ <S%H2874><s%> te-vach an animal וְהָכֵ֔ן <S%H3559><s%> ve-ha-Chen, and make ready כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אִתִּ֛י <S%H854><s%> 'it-Ti are to יֹאכְל֥וּ <S%H398><s%> yo-che-Lu shall dine הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H582><s%> ha-'a-na-Shim for [these] men בַּֽצָּהֳרָֽיִם׃ <S%H6672><s%> Batz-tzo-ho-Ra-yim. with me at noon

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as did הָאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish, And the man כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar bade יוֹסֵ֑ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef; as Joseph וַיָּבֵ֥א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Ve brought הָאִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish and the man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H376><s%> ha-'a-na-Shim the men בֵּ֥יתָה <S%H1004><s%> Bei-tah house יוֹסֵֽף׃ <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef. into Joseph's

וַיִּֽירְא֣וּ <S%H3372><s%> vai-yi-re-'U were afraid הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <S%H376><s%> ha-'a-na-Shim, now the men כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki because הֽוּבְאוּ֮ <S%H935><s%> hu-ve-'U because they were brought בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit house יוֹסֵף֒ <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef into Joseph's וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru, and they said עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against דְּבַ֤ר <S%H1697><s%> de-Var Because הַכֶּ֙סֶף֙ <S%H3701><s%> hak-Ke-sef of the money הַשָּׁ֤ב <S%H7725><s%> hash-Shav that was returned בְּאַמְתְּחֹתֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H572><s%> be-'am-te-cho-Tei-nu in our sacks בַּתְּחִלָּ֔ה <S%H8462><s%> bat-te-chil-Lah, at the first time אֲנַ֖חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> 'a-Nach-nu we מֽוּבָאִ֑ים <S%H935><s%> mu-va-'Im; are we brought in לְהִתְגֹּלֵ֤ל <S%H1556><s%> le-hit-go-Lel that he may seek occasion עָלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu against וּלְהִתְנַפֵּ֣ל <S%H5307><s%> u-le-hit-nap-Pel against us and fall עָלֵ֔ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu, against וְלָקַ֧חַת <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-Ka-chat upon us and take אֹתָ֛נוּ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Ta-nu לַעֲבָדִ֖ים <S%H5650><s%> la-'a-va-Dim us for bondmen וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et חֲמֹרֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H2543><s%> cha-mo-Rei-nu. and our asses
